title: Design of Ontology-Based Intelligent Instructional Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students can use real-time collaboration and ontology editing tools with digital devices, accumulating practical experience in designing educational systems through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically represent and analyze knowledge structures in scientific domains using ontology frameworks.
Learners can search for and evaluate appropriate teaching methods in an instructional design knowledge base by applying set-theoretic reasoning.
Learners can design and validate prototypes of intelligent tutoring systems through project-based methodologies in digital environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
